text: Heart Like a Wheel is a 1983 American biographical romantic drama movie directed by Jonathan Kaplan and stars Bonnie Bedelia, Beau Bridges, Hoyt Axton, Leo Rossi, Anthony Edwards, Bill McKinney. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1984. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 romantic drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Kaplan Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Heart Like a Wheel (movie)
